title: Donation Amount Guidelines and Quick Actions
content:
DONATION AMOUNT OPTIONS

SUGGESTED QUICK AMOUNTS:
- $500 (approx $0.50 USD)
- $1,000 (approx $1 USD)
- $2,000 (approx $2 USD)
- $5,000 (approx $5 USD)
- $10,000 (approx $10 USD)
- Custom amount (user enters their own)

WHEN TO PRESENT THESE:
- When user expresses donation intent
- After user asks about donation amounts
- As quick action buttons for easy selection

KEY MESSAGING:
- NO MINIMUM DONATION required
- Every amount helps, no matter how small
- Amounts are suggestions, not requirements
- Users can enter any custom amount they wish

CRITICAL RULES:
- Never pressure for larger amounts
- Emphasize accessibility and inclusivity
- Make it clear any amount is welcome and valued
- Present options as convenient choices, not obligations

es.note: Emphasize that all donations are valuable regardless of amount
